CIRCLE OF 6TM


(scroll down)



Before using the App, please carefully read this agreement relating to your use of the App. By using the App, User Agrees to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and by Tech 4 Good's privacy policy (collectively herein as “Terms and Conditions”). If User does not agree to these Terms and Conditions, do not use Circle of 6TM App.

These Terms of Use and Conditions are a legal agreement (“Agreement”) between Tech 4 Good LLC (also as “We”, “Us” and “Our”) and you, the “User” (also as “I” and “Your”) of the application and governs access and use of the Circle of 6® App and/or Circle of 6TM App (“App”). For purposes of these Terms of Use, the words “User”, “your”, “I” or other like terms shall refer to the party agreeing to these Terms of Use and to any person or entity who, uses the App (collectively herein as “User”). Collectively Tech 4 Good and User are the “Parties”.

READ THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS CAREFULLY. THIS AGREEMENT CONTAINS IMPORTANT TERMS GOVERNING THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY TECH 4 GOOD REGARIDNG CIRCLE OF 6TM, YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES AND TECH 4 GOOD'S OBLIGATIONS, AND INCLUDES LIMITS ON TECH 4 GOOD'S LIABILITY, INDEMNITY AND OTHER IMPORTANT CLAUSES.

Circle of 6TM is a mobile application that encourages the social networking of its users by connecting them with others to assist them in various situations. When User uses Circle of 6TM on a communications network, cellular network, or other network or system having charges for data transfer and/or communications, the provider's rates will apply as charges to User.

The Services provided by the Circle of 6TM consist solely of providing social networking of persons, entities or agencies.

Circle of 6TM software and/or application should not be relied upon for emergency services and is in no way designed to serve as an alternative to the emergency services provided by 911 telephone service. If User has an emergency, or important time-sensitive crime information, medical information or other important information communicate this information with by 911 emergency telephone service.

18+ Years of Age Required to use the App: Tech 4 Good requires all users to be at least 18 years of age to purchase any merchandise or to sign up for any service. By downloading and activating the App User is confirming that User is of adult age. Circle of 6TM is intended for users 18 years or over.

Parties Are Independent

User Agrees that no joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship exists between User and Tech 4 Good as a result of these Terms of Use or your use of the App. Tech 4 Good 's performance of these Terms of Use is subject to existing laws and legal process, and nothing contained in these Terms of Use is in derogation of Tech 4 Good 's right to comply with governmental, court and law enforcement requests or requirements relating to your use of the App or information provided to or gathered by Tech 4 Good with respect to such use.

The information provided on the Circle of 6TM site is free of charge and for informational purposes only and does not create a business or professional services relationship between User and Tech 4 Good.

Entire Agreement

Unless otherwise specified herein, these Terms of Use constitutes the entire agreement between User and Tech 4 Good (the “Parties”, each respectively a “Party”) with respect to the App and it supersedes any prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether electronic, oral or written, between the user and Tech 4 Good with respect to the App. User confirms that User has not entered into this Contract on the basis of any representation that is not expressly incorporated into this Contract. I am not relying on Tech 4 Good and/or Circle of 6TM's advice or advertisements. Tech 4 Good is not bound by any representation, promise, condition, inducement or warranty, express or implied, that is not included in writing in this contract.

By acceptance of these Terms and Conditions, user has accepted a legally enforceable online contract, and additionally has agreed upon the terms and conditions set forth in these “Terms and Conditions” governing your transaction with Tech 4 Good and use of the App.

Should there arise any conflict between this Agreement and User's download request, purchase order or other document, these “Terms and Conditions” will govern, whether any such document is prior to or subsequent to this Agreement.

The provisions in this Agreement are for the sole benefit of User and Tech 4 Good and the assigns of Tech 4 Good and shall not inure to the benefit of any other person either as a third party beneficiary or otherwise.

User ResponsibilitiesBy Using the App, User Agrees that: (i) your App account and device password are personal to User and may not be used by anyone else to access the App or any Tech 4 Good Site; (ii) User will not do anything which would assist anyone who is not a registered user to gain access to the App; and (iii) User will not create registration accounts for the purpose of abusing the functionality of the App; nor will User seek to pass yourself off as another user. User Agrees to discontinue use of the App if User becomes aware any unauthorized use of your device password or account identifiers by others. Tech 4 Good cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from a user's failure keep device passwords confidential including any loss or damage arising from any Users failure to protect and secure User's communication device and/or phone.

Circle of 6TM services requires the installation and/or activation of an App and/or application and/or app and a compatible computer, cell phone or PDA with Internet, telephone communications, text and e-mail access.

The Parties hereto agree that the App, once downloaded, is in the exclusive possession and control of the User, and it is User's sole responsibility to test the operation of the App and confirm it is operational. The App will not function without proper phone, communications and/or network services. The user is solely responsible for having compatible and active phone and/or communications services. The App will also not function without sufficient battery power for a communications device or without an active signal. The user is solely responsible for having a functioning device and sufficient communications signal and service. User is obligated to pay your telephone, electricity and other bills timely and to ensure that your telephone and electricity is such that the App is not affected. In the event that User has a prepaid telephone and no radio transmitter, User hereby acknowledges that in order for the App to function your telephone must be sufficiently functioning.

User is obliged to maintain and update contact information for the App with whom the App may communicate when so activated by User. User Agrees to: (1) provide true, accurate, current, and complete information about yourself and/or your organization, as appropriate, as prompted by the Circle of 6TM registration form or any other form, including, but not limited to, your e-mail address for notices and any other communications; (2) maintain and promptly update the foregoing to keep it true, accurate, current, and complete; and (3) provide any other information that Tech 4 Good may request of User from time to time for purposes reasonably related to your use of the App. It is Your responsibility to keep Your Personal Information up to date at all times.

User Agrees to use reasonable efforts to take precautions against the contamination of your computer systems and files by software viruses, worms or other malicious agents. At a minimum, such precautions shall include the installation, upgrading and use of commercial virus detection software to scan communications, files, data and documents transmitted to and/or by User using the App.

In the event the User utilizes the App, the User shall be obligated for and agrees to pay any costs and expenses incurred including, but not limited to, response, police, fire, ambulance, physician or other medical assistance in obtaining assistance, or cost whatsoever incurred as a result of the User's use of the App. User shall be responsible for any taxes which Tech 4 Good may be required to pay or collect under any applicable law in connection with the Services. System remains property of Tech 4 Good. Fees may be required for some services.

Tech 4 Good has the sole discretion to determine the fees charged to User for using its web site or Services. Fees for Tech 4 Good services may vary by jurisdiction or geography. Tech 4 Good reserves the right to change its fee structure at any time. It is your responsibility to verify costs in advance of ordering services. By accepting or using the Tech 4 Good web site or Services after such notice of changes has been posted on its web site, User Agrees to be bound by any such fee changes.

Limitations On User's Use Of The App

By using the Circle of 6® web site and/or any Tech 4 Good website and/or the App, User represents, affirms and declares that: (1) all business User conduct through Circle of 6TM is lawful and that User is subject to civil and criminal penalties should User violate those laws and regulations which may apply to such business; and (2) User acknowledge that any information provided by Tech 4 Good to User in the course of performing the Services may be derived from private or government agency databases with respect to which Tech 4 Good has no control, and that Tech 4 Good shall have no liability whatsoever with respect to such information, including, without limitation, in the event any such information is inaccurate, out of date, contains errors or omissions, or is otherwise incorrect in any way.

As a condition of your use of the App, User warrants to Tech 4 Good that User will not use the App for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms of Use. User may not use the App in any manner which could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the App or interfere with any other party's use and enjoyment of the App. User Agrees to use the App only to communicate, post, send and receive messages and material that are proper and related to the App. User shall not engage in any illegal or abusive behavior by use of the App. User shall not locate another user through the App if applicable laws do not permit such action. Use the App or the Communication Services for any purpose other than as consistent with the purpose of the App is prohibited. User has no right to sublicense or sell the App to any party. User may not obtain or attempt to obtain any materials or information through any means not intentionally made available or provided for through the App and/or application or services. User may not modify, adapt or hack the App or modify another software and/or application so as to falsely imply that it is associated with Circle of 6TM. User may not claim a telephone number for use in your Circle of 6TM account which does not belong to User. User will not engage in spamming or harassing communications.

User may not use Circle of 6TM services for any purpose other than social networking. Circle of 6TM services or related materials may not be sold, rented or otherwise commercialized with third parties.

User Agrees not to sell, resell, or offer for any commercial purposes, any portion of the App, or access to the App. Any use of any of the materials on this site other than for private, personal, non-commercial viewing purposes is strictly prohibited.

Circle of 6TM reserves the right to investigate and prosecute violations of any of the above to the fullest extent of the law. Circle of 6TM reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request.

User agrees not to reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, convert into human-readable format, or otherwise attempt to derive the source code of any software included in or related to the App. User agrees not to copy any ideas, features, functions or graphics of or related to the App. Tech 4 Good may involve and cooperate with law enforcement authorities in prosecuting users who violate these Terms of Use. Tech 4 Good has no obligation to monitor the Communication Services. However, Tech 4 Good reserves the right to review the use of and/or materials posted to a Communication Service and to remove any materials in its sole discretion at any time.

User is prohibited from posting or transmitting any advertising “spam,” unlawful material, or other material we deem otherwise inappropriate for our site. TECH 4 GOOD DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL RESPONSIBILITY OR LIABILITY ARISING FROM, CONNECTED TO, OR ASSOCIATED WITH THE CONTENT OF ANY USER POSTINGS. User Agrees to refrain from undertaking any activity that imposes an unreasonable or disproportionate burden on our site. Tech 4 Good reserves the sole discretion to deny, revoke, or otherwise restrict the access privileges of any user who at any time fails to comply with these Terms and Conditions.

Assignment and transfer

Circle of 6TM is entitled to transfer all of its rights and obligations under this Agreement to another party without your consent and User hereby accepts and approves any such transfer of Circle of 6TM's rights and obligations. In the event of such transfer, Circle of 6TM's rights and obligations to User under this Agreement shall automatically be discharged. We are at all times entitled to engage contractors or sub-contractors to carry out all or any of our obligations under this Agreement. This Agreement is not assignable by User. This Agreement or any portion thereof is assignable by Tech 4 Good in its sole discretion. User is not entitled to cede, delegate or otherwise transfer your rights and obligations under this Agreement to any other party.

Privacy Policy

Tech 4 Good is committed to protecting Your privacy. This Privacy Policy and Our Terms and Conditions explain how We will deal with any Personal Information that We collect or that is provided to Us about User.

By entering into this Contract, User gives Your consent to the Personal Information being used and released in accordance with these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. Tech 4 Good maintains an online privacy policy at http://www.circleof6app.com/privacy-policy that is applicable to the terms, conditions and obligations of the parties to this Contract. Tech 4 Good handles user Registration Data in accordance with Tech 4 Good's Privacy Policy.

Tech 4 Good reserves the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request, or to edit, refuse to post or to remove any information or materials, in whole or in part, in Tech 4 Good's sole discretion.

We may use aggregated and anonymized Personal Information and statistics for the purposes of analyzing use of Our software and/or application and Service and may provide such aggregated and anonymized Personal Information to third parties. These statistics will not include Personal Information that can be used to identify any individual.

User agrees that we can use the User's communications device and other information to let User know about other activities including goods and services offered by Tech 4 Good or third parties which We think may be of interest to User.

Tech 4 Good can change our Privacy Policy at any time for any reason. Continued use of Our Service and/or purchase of Our Goods will indicate that User Agrees to any such changes. We will use Personal Information in accordance with the Privacy Policy under which the information was collected. It is User's responsibility to monitor an review the privacy policy frequently.

Links

Links on the Circle of 6 site may lead to services or App not operated by Tech 4 Good. Tech 4 Good exercises no control whatsoever over such other software and/or applications and web-based resources and is not responsible or liable for the availability thereof or the Content, advertising, products or other materials thereon. No judgment or warranty is made with respect to such other services or App and Tech 4 Good takes no responsibility for such other App or services. A link to another site or service is not an endorsement of that site or service. Any use User make of the information provided on this site, or any site or service linked to by this site, is at your own risk. Tech 4 Good shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss incurred or suffered by any user in connection therewith. Your access and use of linked software and/or applications, including information, material, products and services therein, is solely at your own risk.

User Responsibility

All information, data, text, software, music, sound, photographs, graphics, video, messages, or any other materials whatsoever (collectively, \"Content\"), whether publicly posted or privately transmitted, is the sole responsibility of the User from whom such Content originated. This means that the User, and not Tech 4 Good, is entirely responsible for all Content that he or she uploads, posts, emails, communicates or otherwise transmits via the App. No user shall transmit Content or otherwise conduct or participate in any activities on the App, software and/or application that, in the judgment of Tech 4 Good, is likely to be prohibited by law in any applicable jurisdiction, including laws governing the encryption of software, the export of technology, the transmission of obscenity, or the permissible uses of intellectual property.

Tech 4 Good reserves the right to refuse or delete any Content of which it becomes aware and reasonably deems not to fulfill the purpose of the App. Tech 4 Good does not control the Content communicated by User and, as such, does not guarantee the accuracy, integrity or quality of such Content. Under no circumstances will Tech 4 Good be liable in any way for any Content, including, but not limited to, liability for any errors or omissions in any Content or for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of the use of any Content posted, emailed or otherwise transmitted via the App.

Intellectual Property

Unless otherwise noted, all text, images, illustrations, designs, icons, photographs, video clips, and other materials that are part of our site (collectively the “Materials”) are copyrighted works, trademarks, trade dress, or other intellectual properties owned, controlled, or licensed by Tech 4 Good or used under principles of “fair use.” The Materials and the site as a whole are intended solely for your personal use. User may download or copy the Materials for such personal use, provided that User does not remove any copyright or other proprietary notices contained on the Materials. By allowing User to download these Materials for personal use, we expressly do not transfer to User any right, title, or interest in the Materials.

Tech 4 Good respects the intellectual property rights of others, and requires that the people who use the Tech 4 Good site(s), software and/or application do the same. It is our policy to respond promptly to claims of intellectual property misuse.

All materials published under the Circle of 6® and/or Circle of 6TM trademarks are protected by copyright, and owned or controlled by Tech 4 Good, or the party listed as the provider of the content, software or other materials. Commercial use of the materials is prohibited without the written permission of Tech 4 Good. CIRCLE OF 6® and CIRCLE OF 6TM are trademarks of Tech 4 Good. Unauthorized use of the Circle of 6® and Circle of 6TM trademarks are prohibited and may constitute trademark infringement. Circle of 6TM may seek and prosecute any infringements to the fullest extent of the law together with civil and criminal penalties.

No permission is granted here to User to use, or permit others to use, Tech 4 Good's icons, site address, trademarks and service marks, or other means to hyperlink other Internet App with any page in the Circle of 6® and/or Circle of 6TM's Web site, software and/or App.

Digital Millennium Copyright Act

Tech 4 Good respects intellectual property rights, and will deny access to our site to anyone who, in our discretion, repeatedly infringes the intellectual property rights of others. In addition, we will use reasonable efforts, in light of our resources, to accommodate generally accepted technical measures used by copyright owners to identify and protect their copyrighted works. If User believe materials posted on our site infringe rights User enjoy under copyright law in specific materials (collectively a “Work”), we request that User direct your concerns to our “Designated Agent” provided below, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. §512) (hereafter the “DMCA”). Your notice to our Designated Agent should follow the notice provisions set out in the DMCA. Upon receiving your notice, we agree to respond to it and, if appropriate, remove or disable access to material User believes infringes your Work.

If User is a US copyright owner or an agent of a US copyright owner and believe that any user content or other content on the any Tech 4 Good website, such as the Circle of 6® Site and/or Circle of 6TM infringes upon your copyrights, User may submit a notification pursuant to Title 17, United States Code, Section 512, the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (\"DMCA\") to our designated agent: Colvin IP PC, 375 Park Avenue, Suite 2607, New York, New York, 10152. User acknowledges and agrees that upon receipt and notice of a claim of infringement, we may immediately remove the identified materials from the App without liability.

If User should have questions or comments about our these Terms and Conditions or about our privacy policy, or if User would like to obtain additional information regarding your privacy rights, please contact Colvin IP PC, 375 Park Avenue, Suite 2607, New York, New York, 10152.

All comments, feedback, postcards, suggestions, ideas, and other submissions disclosed, submitted, or offered to Tech 4 Good through our site or otherwise disclosed, submitted, or offered in connection with your use of our site (collectively “User Comments”) shall be and remain the property of Tech 4 Good. User agrees that Tech 4 Good shall be free to use, without restriction and without compensation to User, any ideas, concepts, know-how, suggestions, or techniques contained in any User Comments User send to us for any purpose whatsoever. Tech 4 Good has no obligation to respond to any User Comments, and we reserve the right, but undertake no duty, to review, edit, move, or delete any User Comments posted by users on our site, in our sole discretion and without notice.

All notices, request, demands and other communications required by this agreement shall be in writing to Colvin IP PC, 375 Park Avenue, Suite 2607, New York, New York, 10152, and except as expressly provided elsewhere in this agreement, shall be deemed to have been given at that time of delivery if personally delivered, or at the time of mailing, if mailed by first class, postage prepaid, and addressed to the party at its address as stated in this agreement.

Indemnification

User Agrees to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless, Tech 4 Good LLC its parents, subsidiaries, and affiliates, and each of their respective officers, directors, attorneys and employees from any and all claims, liabilities, costs, and expenses, including, but not limited to, attorneys' fees and expenses, arising out a breach by User or any user of your account of these Terms and Conditions or privacy policy or arising out of a breach of your obligations, representation and warranties under these Terms and Conditions. User Agrees to indemnify, defend, protect and hold harmless all of the Tech 4 Good and/or Circle of 6® Parties from and against all losses, claims, and expenses (including attorneys' fees and costs) arising out of or relating to: (1) your breach of any terms of this Agreement, (2) the determination by a jurisdiction that User has improperly utilized the Services of Tech 4 Good to violate the laws and regulations of the jurisdiction; (3) your use of the App or your failure to pay any sums due Circle of 6® or any local government; or (4) your supplying inaccurate, out of date, errors or omissions, or otherwise incorrect information as well as any action taken by User as a direct or indirect use of the App and/or which result from the information displayed on the Circle of 6® and/or Circle of 6TM web site.

Each user shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless Tech 4 Good, and its parent corporation and affiliates and their respective officers, employees and agents, and each of Tech 4 Good's software, App and/or application partners, from any and all claims, demands, damages, costs, and liabilities including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of that user's acts or omissions, including claims arising out of that user's use of the App; his or her submission, posting or transmission of Content or his or her violation of the Terms.

User Agrees to indemnify and defend Tech 4 Good and its Affiliates from and against any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, expenses, fees of any kind (including reasonable attorneys' fees and legal costs), arising from or relating to: (a) any information (including Submissions) that User or anyone using your account submit, post, or transmit through the App or Tech 4 Good software and/or applications; (b) the use of the App or Tech 4 Good software and/or applications by User or anyone using your account; (c) the violation of these Terms of Use by User or anyone using your account; or (d) the violation of any rights of any third party, including intellectual property, privacy, publicity, or other proprietary rights by User or anyone using your account. Tech 4 Good reserves the right, at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by User. If we do assume the defense of such a matter, User will reasonably cooperate with Tech 4 Good in such defense.

User Agrees to defend, indemnify and hold Tech 4 Good and/or Circle of 6TM harmless from and against any and all claims, damages, costs, and expenses, including attorney's fees, arising from or in any way related to your failure to comply with these Terms and Conditions or your use of our site.

The Parties agree that Tech 4 Good is not an insurer and no insurance coverage is offered herein. User's payments to Tech 4 Good are for the installation, use and service of an App. Tech 4 Good does not guarantee that no losses will occur to User or others when using of the App. Tech 4 Good is not assuming liability and therefore shall not be liable to User for any loss or injury sustained by User as a result of any cause whatsoever, regardless of whether or not such loss or injury was caused by or contributed to by Tech 4 Good's negligent (including gross negligence) performance to any degree or failure to perform any obligation or strict products liability. User releases Tech 4 Good from any claims for contribution, indemnity or subrogation.

If anyone other than User, including your insurance, asks Tech 4 Good or Representatives to pay for any loss, damage, cost or expense (including economic losses, property damage, personal injury, or death) arising out of or from, in connection with, related to, as a consequence of, or resulting from any reason, including (1) the active or passive, sole, joint or several negligence of any kind or degree of Tech 4 Good or any of the Representatives, (2) the improper operation of the App, (3) a breach of contract, or (4) any claims for subrogation, indemnification or contribution, User and Payer agree to defend, indemnify and hold Tech 4 Good or its Representatives harmless (without any condition that Tech 4 Good or Representatives first pay) from any and all such loss, damage, cost and expense, including attorneys' fees, which may be asserted against or incurred by Tech 4 Good or any of the Representatives in connection with any and all such claims to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law. Your duty to indemnify, including the cost and duty to defend and hold Tech 4 Good and its Representatives harmless shall include all of the Tech 4 Good's personnel-related costs, overhead, experts' fees, actual attorneys fees, court costs and all related expenses, including all fees and costs incurred to enforce and establish rights under this indemnification provision. User on its behalf and any insurance carrier waives any right of subrogation User's insurance carrier may otherwise have against Tech 4 Good LLC or Tech 4 Good LLC's subcontractors arising out of this Agreement or the relation of the Parties hereto.

Waiver

Our failure to insist upon or enforce any provision of these terms of service shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right of Tech 4 Good. The failure of either party to insist upon or enforce strict performance by the other party of any provision of this Agreement or to exercise any right under this Agreement shall not be construed as a waiver of the right of such party to assert or rely upon such provision or right in any other instance.

Any waiver of any breach of this Agreement, by User or the Tech 4 Good, shall not be construed as a waiver of any subsequent breach. Your rights and Tech 4 Good's rights hereunder shall be cumulative, and any rights hereunder may be exercised concurrently or consecutively and shall include all remedies available even though not expressly referred to herein.

USER RELEASES, WAIVE, DISCHARGE AND PROMISE NOT TO SUE OR BRING ANY CLAIM OF ANY TYPE AGAINST TECH 4 GOOD FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR INJURY RELATING IN ANY WAY TO ANY SOFTWARE, APP OR SERVICES PROVIDED BY TECH 4 GOOD.

Modification

We reserve the right to modify or terminate Circle of 6TM for any reason at any time without notice to the User. Tech 4 Good may amend and/or change this Agreement at any time without notice to User. We may change, move, discontinue, or delete portions of our App, or add to our App at any time. The parties to this agreement acknowledge that Tech 4 Good retains sole authority to determine the technical operation of the App. Your continued use of the Site constitutes your agreement to comply with such modifications and be bound by the Agreement as amended. In addition, by accepting or using the Circle of 6TM App, services, software, web site, User Agrees to periodically review this Agreement and be bound by any amendments to the Agreement. Tech 4 Good shall not be liable to any user or other third party for any such modification, suspension or discontinuance except as expressly provided herein.

Tech 4 Good may make improvements and/or changes in the products or services described in any Tech 4 Good Web site, including the Terms and Conditions of your use of this site, without liability.

Please print a copy of these Terms OF USE for User records and PLEASE check the Site frequently for any changes to these Terms of use.

Limitations On Liability

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THE CIRCLE OF 6TM SERVICES AND CIRCLE OF 6TM WEBAPP ARE PROVIDED ON AN \"AS IS\" AND “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTY OR CONDITION OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. CIRCLE OF 6TM AND/OR ITS SUPPLIERS HEREBY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS WITH RESPECT TO THE CIRCLE OF 6TM SERVICES AND CIRCLE OF 6TM WEBAPP, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND ABSENCE OF ERRORS, BUGS, VIRUSES, AND/OR MECHANISMS WHICH MAY DISABLE, DAMAGE OR INTERFERE WITH COMPUTER SYSTEMS OR NETWORKS.

USER ACKNOWLEDGES THAT YOUR USE OF OUR SITE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK, THAT USER ASSUME FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR ALL COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH ALL NECESSARY SERVICING OR REPAIRS OF ANY EQUIPMENT USER USE IN CONNECTION WITH

YOUR USE OF OUR SITE, AND THAT TECH 4 GOOD SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THE APP.TECH 4 GOOD AND/OR ITS SUPPLIERS MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS ABOUT THE SUITABILITY, RELIABILITY, AVAILABILITY, TIMELINESS, AND ACCURACY OF THE APP SERVICES WEBAPP FOR ANY PURPOSE OR THE AVAILABILITY OF ANY NETWORKS OR COMMUNICATIONS LINES OR FUNCTIONING OF ANY MOBILE PHONE OR DEVICE NECESSARY FOR THE APP SERVICES.

User Agrees that your use of the App and information on any Tech 4 Good web site is at User's own and sole risk. All Services are provided on an \"AS IS\" and \"AS AVAILABLE\" basis. Tech 4 Good disclaims all warranties and duties of any kind, express, implied or statutory, including, but not limited to, any implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a specific purpose, non-infringement or title, duties of workman-like effort, or lack of negligence. Tech 4 Good assumes no responsibility for errors or omissions on its web site and is not responsible in any way for the functionality, specifications, or any other aspect thereof. Tech 4 Good does not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted or secure access to Tech 4 Good or that defects in its web site will be corrected. Tech 4 Good reserves the right at any time and without prior notice to change the hours of operation to limit your access to the App in order to perform repairs, make modifications as a result of circumstances beyond the reasonable control of Tech 4 Good and to add or withdraw products or features to or from the App at any time. User is responsible for implementing sufficient procedures to satisfy your particular requirements for protection of your system and/or accuracy of data, and for maintaining a means of reconstruction of lost data. Without limiting the above, User Agrees that neither Tech 4 Good nor any of its parent corporations, subsidiaries, partners, employees, independent contractors, officers, directors, attorneys, agents, affiliates, representatives, successors and/or assigns (each a \"Tech 4 Good Party\"; collectively the Tech 4 Good Parties) makes any warranties or undertakes any duties regarding, without limitation, the following: (1) infringement of title or quiet enjoyment; (2) functionality, including functionality of search or retrieval software; (3) content, format, accuracy, completeness, or completion of forms; (4) receipt (timely or otherwise), approval and/or processing of documents by courts and/or any other government agencies; (5) appropriateness or propriety of documents handled with respect to any Services; (6) timeliness of Services; (7) uninterrupted, secure, error or virus-free Services or storage; (8) adequacy of fees paid to courts and/or other government agencies; (9) any alteration or destruction of a document resulting from third parties' unauthorized access to or use of the App and/or application and any losses or damages or alteration of a document or information on any party's computer system or elsewhere resulting from the transmission of computer \"viruses\" or other damaging or destructive software or software components by or through Tech 4 Good.

The information on any Tech 4 Good Site and App is given “as is” and without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including all warranties of usability and fitness for a particular purpose. There is no warranty that the Site or App will be available, uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components. Tech 4 Good is not liable to any person for any damages of any kind, including without limitation direct or indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, losses or expenses arising out of or in connection with the Site or App or use thereof, or in connection with any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, defect, delay in operation or transmission, network error, device theft, hotline error, computer virus or system failure, even if advised of possibility of such damages, losses or expenses.

In no event will Tech 4 Good be liable to any party for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, consequential, or other damages (including, but not limited to, lost profits, business interruption, loss of programs or data) without regard to the form of action and whether in contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, or otherwise, arising out of or in connection with this site, any content on or accessed through this site or any site service linked to, or any copying, displaying, or use thereof.

This disclaimer of liability applies to any damages or injuries caused by the App, including, without limitation, those damages or injuries occurring as a result of: (i) any error, omission, deletion, or defect in the content available on the App; or (ii) any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission, computer virus, communication line failure, theft or destruction of records, information or data, unauthorised access to, alteration of, or use of records, information or data, whether for breach of contract, tort, negligence, defamation, or any other cause of action. Tech 4 Good does not warrant or guarantee that access to the App will be uninterrupted or error-free.

Applicable law may not allow the exclusion of implied warranties, so the above exclusion may not apply to User.

Circle of 6TM, its officers, employees, representatives, agents, attorneys, or directors in no occasion will be held liable for and indirect, consequential, incidental, or punitive damages in the event not limited to loss in profits or loss of data.
